entities.name: dementors
entities.description: Dementors are mentioned as being present in Little Whinging, causing Harry and Dudley to be affected by them. ("Dementors here, in Little Whinging . . .")

entities.name: little whinging
entities.description: Little Whinging is mentioned as the location where Dementors are present. ("Dementors here, in Little Whinging . . .")

entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is mentioned as being affected by the Dementors and lying curled up on the ground. ("Dudley lay curled up on the ground, whimpering and shaking.")

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as being affected by the Dementors and trying to help Dudley. ("He could not believe what ha d just happened. Dementors here, in Little Whinging . . .")

entities.name: mrs. figg
entities.description: Mrs. Figg is mentioned as arriving on the scene and warning Harry not to put away his wand. ("Mrs. Figg, their batty old neighbor,  came panting into sight.")

entities.name: mundungus fletcher
entities.description: Mundungus Fletcher is mentioned as someone Mrs. Figg is angry with and wants to kill. ("Oh, I’m going to kill Mundungus Fletcher!")

relationships.description: Harry is affected by the Dementors, as evidenced by his sweat and reaction to them. ("He could not believe what ha d just happened. Dementors here, in Little Whinging . . .")
Dudley is affected by the Dementors, as evidenced by his whimpering and shaking. ("Dudley lay curled up on the ground, whimpering and shaking.")
Harry is trying to help Dudley after he is affected by the Dementors. ("He bent down to see whether he wa s in a fit state to stand up, but")
Mrs. Figg is angry with Mundungus Fletcher and wants to kill him. ("Oh, I’m going to kill Mundungus Fletcher!")
